name: datedly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in an old-fashioned way: His words were both datedly romantic and very revealing. The student rooms are adequate, if datedly furnished.
More examplesFewer examplesSome of their early hits can sound thin and datedly 1980s.He looked lovely and was charmingly, if rather datedly, dressed.The portrayal of the future in the book looks datedly modern to us now.She criticized his translations for being datedly Victorian in style.This is not about individual states "picking winners", as he rather datedly suggests.
